64 namespace cinder { namespace app {
65 
66 class App;
67 
68 typedef std::shared_ptr<class Renderer> RendererRef;
69 class Renderer {
70  public:
71  virtual ~Renderer() {};
72 
73  virtual RendererRef clone() const = 0;
74 
75 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA )
76  #if defined( CINDER_MAC )
77  virtual void setup( App *aApp, CGRect frame, NSView *cinderView, RendererRef sharedRenderer, bool retinaEnabled ) = 0;
78  virtual CGContextRef getCgContext() { throw; } // the default behavior is failure
79  virtual CGLContextObj getCglContext() { throw; } // the default behavior is failure
80  virtual CGLPixelFormatObj getCglPixelFormat() { throw; } // the default behavior is failure
81  #elif defined( CINDER_COCOA_TOUCH )
82  virtual void setup( App *aApp, const Area &frame, UIView *cinderView, RendererRef sharedRenderer ) = 0;
83  virtual bool isEaglLayer() const { return false; }
84  #endif
85 
86 
87  virtual void setFrameSize( int width, int height ) {}
88 
89 #elif defined( CINDER_MSW )
90  virtual void setup( App *aApp, HWND wnd, HDC dc, RendererRef sharedRenderer ) = 0;
91 
92  virtual void prepareToggleFullScreen() {}
93  virtual void finishToggleFullScreen() {}
94  virtual void kill() {}
95 
96  virtual HWND getHwnd() = 0;
97  virtual HDC getDc() { return NULL; }
98 #endif
99 
100  virtual Surface copyWindowSurface( const Area &area ) = 0;
101 
102  virtual void startDraw() {}
103  virtual void finishDraw() {}
104  virtual void makeCurrentContext() {}
105  virtual void defaultResize() {}
106 
107  protected:
108  Renderer() : mApp( 0 ) {}
109  Renderer( const Renderer &renderer );
110 
111  App *mApp;
112 };

114 typedef std::shared_ptr<class RendererGl> RendererGlRef;
115 class RendererGl : public Renderer {
116  public:
117 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA_TOUCH )
118  RendererGl( int aAntiAliasing = AA_MSAA_4 );
119 #else
120  RendererGl( int aAntiAliasing = AA_MSAA_16 );
121 #endif
122  ~RendererGl();
123 
124  static RendererGlRef create( int antiAliasing = AA_MSAA_16 ) { return RendererGlRef( new RendererGl( antiAliasing ) ); }
125  virtual RendererRef clone() const { return RendererGlRef( new RendererGl( *this ) ); }
126 
127 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA )
128  #if defined( CINDER_MAC )
129  virtual void setup( App *aApp, CGRect frame, NSView *cinderView, RendererRef sharedRenderer, bool retinaEnabled );
130  virtual CGLContextObj getCglContext();
131  virtual CGLPixelFormatObj getCglPixelFormat();
132  virtual NSOpenGLContext* getNsOpenGlContext();
133  #elif defined( CINDER_COCOA_TOUCH )
134  virtual void setup( App *aApp, const Area &frame, UIView *cinderView, RendererRef sharedRenderer );
135  virtual bool isEaglLayer() const { return true; }
136  EAGLContext* getEaglContext() const;
137  #endif
138  virtual void setFrameSize( int width, int height );
139 #elif defined( CINDER_MSW )
140  virtual void setup( App *aApp, HWND wnd, HDC dc, RendererRef sharedRenderer );
141  virtual void kill();
142  virtual HWND getHwnd() { return mWnd; }
143  virtual void prepareToggleFullScreen();
144  virtual void finishToggleFullScreen();
145 #endif
146 
147  enum { AA_NONE = 0, AA_MSAA_2, AA_MSAA_4, AA_MSAA_6, AA_MSAA_8, AA_MSAA_16, AA_MSAA_32 };
148  static const int sAntiAliasingSamples[];
149  void setAntiAliasing( int aAntiAliasing );
150  int getAntiAliasing() const { return mAntiAliasing; }
151 
152  virtual void startDraw();
153  virtual void finishDraw();
154  virtual void defaultResize();
155  virtual void makeCurrentContext();
156  virtual Surface copyWindowSurface( const Area &area );
157 
158  protected:
159  RendererGl( const RendererGl &renderer );
160 
161  int mAntiAliasing;
162 #if defined( CINDER_MAC )
163  AppImplCocoaRendererGl *mImpl;
164 #elif defined( CINDER_COCOA_TOUCH )
165  AppImplCocoaTouchRendererGl *mImpl;
166 #elif defined( CINDER_MSW )
167  class AppImplMswRendererGl *mImpl;
168  HWND mWnd;
169  friend class AppImplMswRendererGl;
170 #endif
171 };
